location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from significants amounts of pest damage, which affects the second folio. A very large hole present in the fabric has obscured a significant proportion of the body of the letter, as a result the text in this area is difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter provides information on the circumstances surrounding a vessel lost around Nakheloo and of what little of the vessel has been recovered.
